opis: Prodaje se vikendica,100m2 na parceli od 6514m2. Objekt se sastoji od suterena, prizemlja i potkrovlja. U suterenu se nalazi kuhinja s blagavaonom i spremištem. Prizemlje se sastoji od dnevnog boravka, s izlazom na balkon, spavaće sobe i kupaone. Uz objekt nalazi se spremište od 16m2 i te dvije drvene gospodarske zgrade od 60 m2. Na vikendici je sprovedena struja, grijanje je na drva - u dnevnom borvku nalazi se kalijeva peć, kanalizcija je riješena putem septičke jame, a voda putem hidrofora. Vlasništvo uredno. Ova parcela nalazi se u samom srcu žumberačkog gorja, Parku prirode, te je idealna za sve one koje teže suživotu s prirodom ili su u potrazi za mirom i tišinom. Noršić Selo, jedno od malobrojnih naselja Žumberka, nalazi se podno vrha Noršićka Plešivica (721 m), a prostire se na svega 11 km površine. Žumberka je jedan od najvrjednijih prirodnih i kulturnih predjela kontinentalnog dijela Hrvatske kojeg karakterizira jedinstvena mješavina prirodnih i doprirodnih šuma i prostranih travnjaka unutra čijeg područja se nalaze slikovita naselja na čak 800 m nadmorske visine. Za sve dodatne informacije molim da nam se obratite na: +385 91 306 6630 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor Sve informacije dane od agenta smatraju se važećim, no moraju se zasebno procijeniti. __________________________________________________________ Cottage for sale, 100m2 on a plot of 6514m2. The building consists of ground, first floor and attic. In the ground floor there is a kitchen with a dining room and a storage room. The first floor consists of a living room with access to a balcony, a bedroom and a bathroom. Next to the building there is a storage place of 16m2 and two wooden outbuildings of 60m2. The cottage has electricity, wood heating - there is a fireplace in the living room, sewage is provided via a septic tank, and water via a hydrophore. Ownership in order. This plot is located in the very heart of the Žumberak mountains, the Nature Park, and is ideal for all those who strive for coexistence with nature or are looking for peace and quiet. Noršić Selo, one of the few settlements in Žumberka, is located at the foot of the peak of Noršićka Plešivica (721 m), and covers only 11 km of surface. Žumberka is one of the most valuable natural and cultural areas of the continental part of Croatia, which is characterized by a unique mixture of natural and semi-natural forests and spacious grasslands, within the area of ​​which there are picturesque settlements up to 800 m above sea level. For any additional information, please contact us at: +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 +385 91 306 6630 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor All information provided by agents is considered valid, but must be evaluated separately.
